name: adidas Consortium Campus 80s Running Shoes
short_description: adidas Consortium Campus 80s Primeknit Light Maroon/Running Shoes
long_description: One of three colorways of the adidas Consortium Campus 80s Primeknit set to drop alongside each other. This pair comes in light maroon and running white. Featuring a maroon-based primeknit upper with white accents. A limited release, look out for these at select adidas Consortium accounts worldwide.
